title: The Avarice - The Avarice (EP)
description:
The Avarice are a 4 piece rock band from Uckfield, East Sussex in the UK.
They are currently in the process of recording their album "Age of The Phoenix" which is due to be released in 2008. This torrent is the self titled EP containing tracks which will be included in the album
The band has a small but loyal and enthusiastic following in the uckfield area, playing at a number of pubs and small events locally. They also supported Mexicolas when they played the Tonbridge Wells forum.

Their musical style is best described as hard rock, with elements of grunge. However, some of the material to be included in the upcoming album strays more into the metal genre.


The Band consists of:
Stef Andrews (Lead guitar and vocals)
Jay Atkinson (Guitar and backing vocals)
Dave Hall (Bass and backing vocals)
Dan Brooks (Drums)
